column5: Beautiful Breezy Bayfront Condo perfect for a romantic getaway or solo adventurer. Quiet clean peaceful atmosphere. Equipped with all the amenities/comforts of home. Cable TV and WiFi, the bedroom also has a very comfortable tempurpedic bed. Free parking and access to pool. Washer/dryer available for extended bookings >7days *This listing is available for extended stays with a discount. For weekly stays it's 10%. For stays exceeding 60 days, make your reservation and we can discuss options.
